name: Slide Color
description:
Simple Slider game where you need to rearrange the blocks into correct position, ordered by its color. The colors are generated depending on your selected colors for each corners of the grid.

- Control: In-Menu
Use UP and DOWN arrow to navigate, and change values using LEFT and RIGHT arrow. To START the game, navigate cursor to START and press RIGHT arrow.
- Control: In-Game
Use Up, DOWN, LEFT, and RIGHT arrow to slide around the color.
If you're win, press Z to play again.

(also can be played here)
